Title: Friendly Graven's Mutation Mod
Description:
Just removes a few things from the mod Graven's Mutation Mod by Graven so that it will play nice with other popular mutation mods.

Removed:
Chitin Flesh, Fluffy Feathers, Light Manipulation, Night Vision, Scaly Skin, and Winter Fur.

Tested with:
WM Expanded Mutations, Friendly Improved Mutations, Miscellaneous Mutations, Poison/Paralysis/Confusing Fangs Mutations, Underdark Mutation

Do not use with the original unless you like crashes. All credit goes to the original mod author.
